pages.title: Kamen Rider Zero-Two
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Zero-One (2019, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:zero_one/devices/hiden_zero_two_driver)Hiden Zero-Two Driver$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Punch IX$(li)Strength XII (with empty hand)$(li)Strength V (with weapon)$(li)Speed V$(li)Resistance IV$(li)Night Vision$(li)Haste IV$(li)Jump Boost VII$(li)Fire Resistance
